strapiPost.title: 112 Drive-in Movie Theater
strapiPost.content:
The 112 Drive-in has extended its season into the Fall/Winter starting this week (Thursday-Saturday) and in the month of December, Fridays and Saturday evenings.

  • "The theatre this weekend (Nov. 26-28) will show The Croods The New Age at 7 p.m., followed by The War with Grandpa around 8:45 p.m. Admission to the shows are $10 for adults, and $5 for kids 6-12. Kids 5 and under get in free." - FayettevilleFlyer
  • More information about the 112 Drive-in can be found HERE
